name: Yu-Gi-Oh Raiders Alpha
description:
Hello and welcome to Yu-Gi-Oh Raiders! This is not an official Yu-Gi-Oh game. This is a "FanMade" game. Yu-Gi-Oh is not played normally in this game. It is played a little differently here and I wanted to use my idea to play like this in a game. This game is in the first version. And is still at the very beginning. Means that there is currently little content. Approximately 80+ playing cards, and currently only 3 "raids / duels". But we are currently working on additional content. Booster packs, new duelists like a story mode. If you have any ideas, feel free to write them to our Discord Server. Or of course also here. Thanks to all who support us!
DISCORD SERVER:https://discord.gg/Bw9UDX
